name: Balanced Nutrition
description:
This is my submission for "Scorespace jam #8". The theme was "Balance".

Try to eat as much food as you can. Each item gives you points. While eating, take care about your health and your mood. Some food gives good health, others good mood. Keeping both balanced gives you a score-multiplier.

Green Food is good for health, others good for mood

Be careful: If your health and your mood are too unbalanced, you will get negative points! The score-multiplier will also affect negative points!

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D: Move the Head
  • Space: Dispaly food values

Used:

  • Unity3D
  • Aseprite
  • freesound.org
  • paint.net
